about_the_game:
Story

You serve as an exorcist for the Sect of the Golden Staff, and to prove your abilities you've made it your mission to defeat the mighty fox spirit that litters the legends of the land. Unfortunately, the spirit hasn't been spotted in quite some time... When you finally manage to locate the foxy goddess, it takes a mere three minutes...for her to be slobbering all over that knob?! Distressed at the state of affairs, she asserts that humans no longer fear her, which has led to a loss of faith, and thereby power. Blast! You can only prove yourself by facing the spirit at her strongest, so you agree to help her recover her power in order to engage in a fair and final showdown. As you're considering how she can regain her power, you come up with a rock hard solid idea...

Content

Your work as an exorcist has been delayed. After defeating the mighty two-tailed fox spirit Kanou Mirai much quicker than expected, you've decided to work as her manager and help restore her power so that you two can have a proper battle. As you're musing about how to proceed, you come up with a brilliant idea: You'll have her work as a cam girl and do porno streams!

Over 11 types of stream themes for players to choose from, including Maid, Swimsuit, SM, Bunny Girl, Anal, Furry, 2 Girls 1 Guy, and more! Discipline this foxy goddess to increase her Charm and Lewd stats, then get to streaming!

Stream your ass off and snag sponsors to increase the fans' belief in the fox spirit. The choices you make will affect your relationship with Kanou Mirai. If she's got too much pressure, who knows, she might just annihilate the world.

Live the life of your streams with the fox spirit for 49 days. You'll start out as complete strangers and end up learning what truly resides in each other's hearts. Perhaps, just maybe, you'll find true happiness for the both of you. With 15 potential endings, the choice is in your hands! The game includes 100 CGs, with over 700 visual variations to enjoy!

Character

Kanou Mirai: This foxy spirit is an ice-cold beauty, a goddess so stunning she seems to stand above us all. And yet despite this, she was betrayed by the villagers who once worshipped her and is now severely traumatized. Now, even the smallest of matters causes her to accumulate stress, and her psyche is fragile and easily shaken. Her time as a recluse has led to a lack of modern common sense, which often leads to a generation gap with the protagonist.

Features

◇ Over 30 dynamic positions

◇ Over 100 stunning CGs, with over 700 variations 

◇ 15 outfits to choose from

◇ A gripping, sensual story

◇ Over 10 endings to explore[/p]
